thread.title: Ground News - Kazakhstan to Celebrate Nauryz Festive Events for Ten Days

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Kazakhstan to Celebrate Nauryz Festive Events for Ten Days
text: The Astana Times provides news and information from Kazakhstan and around the world. ASTANA – This year marks the introduction of a new format for the Nauryz holiday in Kazakhstan, with the launch of the Nauryznama Decade, observed annually from March 14 to 23, said Sabit Barlybayev, deputy chairman of the culture committee of the Kazakh Ministry of Culture and Information at a March 13 briefing in the Central Communications Service (CCS), repor… 13 hours agoRead Full Article Think freely.Subscribe and get full access to Ground NewsSubscriptions start at $9.99/year [Subscribe](/subscribe) Not enough coverage to generate an Article Assistant.
